file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-31-01-04 - BAGGAGE-DOOR BELLCRANK ROLLER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-DOOR BELLCRANK ROLLER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the rollers of the upper and lower bellcranks of the baggage door. B. These procedures are applicable to the two upper bellcranks and lower bellcranks. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY BAGGAGE-DOOR BELLCRANK ROLLER - ALL 52-31-01-000-801-A REMOVAL BAGGAGE-DOOR BELLCRANK ROLLER - ALL 52-31-01-400-801-A INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-31-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-31-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. BAGGAGE-DOOR BELLCRANK ROLLER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the rollers of the bellcrank of the baggage door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-45-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 52-30-01-000-801-A/400 BAGGAGE DOOR - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Baggage door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the baggage door ( AMM TASK 52-30-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Remove the lining panels of the baggage door ( AMM MPP 06-45-00/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the roller (6) that moves on the track side as follows: NOTE: These procedures are applicable to the two rollers (6). (a) Remove the cotterpin (2), nut (3), washer (4), and bolt (8) that attach the roller (6) to the support (1). (b) Remove the roller (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-31-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the roller (7) that moves on the track bottom as follows: (a) Remove the retaining ring (5) and special pin (9). (b) Remove the roller (7). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-31-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Bellcrank Roller - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B UPPER BELLCRANK B A UPPER C ZONE BELLCRANK LOWER 813 BELLCRANK UPPER BELLCRANK D ROLLERS C LOWER BELLCRANK DET. B DET. A (TYPICAL) BELLCRANK LOWER BELLCRANK (REF.) D ROLLERS 2. COTTERPIN 1. SUPPORT 9. SPECIAL 3. NUT PIN 4. WASHER 2. COTTERPIN 3. NUT 4. WASHER DET. C (TYPICAL) 8. BOLT 7. ROLLER (ON TRACK BOTTOM) 5. RETAINING RING 6. ROLLER DET. D (ON TRACK SIDE) (TYPICAL) 8. BOLT 145AMM520063.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-31-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-31-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. BAGGAGE-DOOR BELLCRANK ROLLER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the rollers of the bellcrank of the baggage door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-45-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 52-30-01-400-801-A/400 BAGGAGE DOOR - INSTALLATION BAGGAGE-DOOR ACTUATING AND LOCKING AMM TASK 52-31-00-700-801-A/500 MECHANISM - OPERATIONAL TEST/ADJUSTMENT IPC 52-31-00 BAGGAGE DOOR - ACTUATING LOCKING SYSTEM C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Cotter pin IPC 52-31-00 AR Retaining ring IPC 52-31-00 AR H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Baggage door I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the roller (6) that moves on the track side as follows: NOTE: These procedures are applicable to the two rollers (6). (a) Put the roller (6) on the support (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-31-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) Install the bolt (8), washer (4), nut (3), and cotter pin (2) to attach the roller (6) to the support (1). (2) Install the roller (7) that moves on the track bottom as follows: (a) Put the roller (7) on the support (1). (b) Install the special pin (9) and retaining ring (5) to attach the roller (7) to the support (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the baggage door ( AMM TASK 52-30-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Do an operational check of the locking/unlocking mechanism of the baggage door ( AMM TASK 52-31-00-700-801-A/500). (3) Install the lining panels of the baggage door ( AMM MPP 06-45-00/100). (4) Close the baggage door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-31-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
